    • Constructor Detail

      • Ferry

        public Ferry(int fieldID,
             java.lang.String fieldName,
             java.lang.String fieldInfo,
             int price,
             int rent_1,
             int rent_2,
             int rent_3,
             int rent_4)
        Constructor for a ferry-field.
        Parameters:
        fieldID - is the position on the board.
        fieldName - is the name of the field.
        fieldInfo - is the text displayed on the field.
        price - is the price of the field.
        rent_1 - is the rent-price if the owner owns 1 ferry.
        rent_2 - is the rent-price if the owner owns 2 ferries.
        rent_3 - is the rent-price if the owner owns 3 ferries.
        rent_4 - is the rent-price if the owner owns 4 ferries.

        is the rent.
